title: Defender Flail
content: Defender Flail Rare 2~9 Damage 1d8 +1 Bludgeoning Steel Physiology: Reduce incoming Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage by 1. Weapon Enchantment +1 Armour Class +1 Main Hand OnlyTenacity: When you miss an attack, you deal 1 Bludgeoning damage anyway Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: This flail was created to commemorate victory over the devil Belhifet. It has since made its way so far from Easthaven that the locals have long forgotten that chapter of their town's past. Flail 0.9
